Mahākosala：King of Kosala．

He was the father of Pasenadi，and his daughter，Kosaladevī，was given in marriage to Bimbisāra，who received a village inKāsi for her bath money．

（J．ii．237，403； iv．342； SA．i．120，etc．）．

Aggīdatta was the purohita of Mahākosala．

DhA．iii．241．
